meanings.sent1: She transparentized the glass by removing the paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist transparentized the watercolor painting to create a delicate effect.
meanings.sent3: The magician transparentized the cloth, making it disappear before our eyes!
meanings.sent4: Her explanation transparentized the complex concept, making it easy to understand.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight transparentized the curtains, casting a soft glow into the room.

meanings.sent1: The transparentized windows allowed the sunlight to fill the room.
meanings.sent2: The transparentized film gave the packaging a modern look.
meanings.sent3: The ghost costume was so transparentized that it looked almost invisible!
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a transparentized quality, soothing and calming.
meanings.sent5: The lake was so transparentized that you could see the fish swimming below the surface.
